alert.note: Alert for Lancaster (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 3:29PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL LANCASTER COUNTY THROUGH 400 PM EDT... At 328 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over East Petersburg, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, pea size hail, and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Lancaster, Lititz, Millersville, Mount Joy, Manheim, East Petersburg, Salunga-Landisville, Rothsville, Mountville, Leacock, Bird-In-Hand, Smoketown, Dutch Wonderland, Franklin And Marshall College, Lancaster Airport and Millersville University. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
